name: TIVIAN Access
title: TIVIAN Access
body:
Original Confluence URL: https://qbdocs.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/1LS/pages/3890315265/TIVIAN+Access - please cross-check the quality of the ZD article with the Confluence counterpart and remove this line before publishing the ZD article

Overview

This article provides essential information about TIVIAN Access, an optional add-on module for our software package. It outlines the prerequisites, requirements, and important considerations for implementing TIVIAN Access.

Information

This guide focuses on the TIVIAN Access module, its ordering process, and the critical requirements for its implementation.

  • TIVIAN Access Module
  • Implementation Requirements
  • Important Considerations

TIVIAN Access Module

TIVIAN Access is an optional add-on module that can be integrated into our software package. Here's what you need to know:

  • It's an optional feature that enhances our software capabilities.
  • To order TIVIAN Access, visit: https://ww2.umfragecenter.de/uc/order_survey/
  • Navigate to modules > TIVIAN SSO to place your order.

 

Implementation Requirements

Before proceeding with the implementation of TIVIAN Access, there are two critical requirements that must be met:

1. Mandatory Test User Agreement

It is absolutely essential to have a test user agreement in place before selling this module. Key points include:

  • A mandatory test user must be provided (e.g., TivianSSO@customerdomain.com).
  • This requirement is non-negotiable.
  • Failure to provide a test user can result in service disruptions if changes need to be made and cannot be tested beforehand.

2. Qualified Technical Customer Contact

A qualified technical contact from the customer's side is necessary. This person should:

  • Be able to administer their Identity Provider (if there is an IdP).
  • While this can be addressed during the implementation process, it remains an important requirement for smooth integration.

 

Important Considerations

It is crucial to adhere to the outlined requirements to ensure successful implementation and customer satisfaction. Failure to do so may result in:

  • Serious complications during the integration process.
  • Customer dissatisfaction with the service.
  • Potential disruptions in service functionality.

By following these guidelines, we maintain our commitment to quality and service excellence.

 

FAQ

What is TIVIAN Access?

TIVIAN Access is an optional add-on module that can be integrated into our software package to enhance its functionality.

How do I order TIVIAN Access?

You can order TIVIAN Access by visiting https://ww2.umfragecenter.de/uc/order_survey/ and navigating to modules > TIVIAN SSO.

Why is a test user so important?

A test user is crucial for testing any changes or updates to the system without disrupting the live environment. It helps prevent service interruptions and ensures smooth functionality.

What if we don't have a qualified technical contact?

While it's possible to address this during the implementation process, having a qualified technical contact who can administer your Identity Provider is important for a smooth integration. We recommend identifying or training a suitable person for this role.

Tags: TIVIAN Access, SSO, Implementation Requirements, Test User, Technical Contact
